description.value: End Effect: At the end of each of his turns, Ajax can take [[/damage 20]]{20 damage} to end up to two effects on him that can be ended by a saving throw. This damage can't be reduced in any way.

Ajax dies only when his Stamina reaches −140. While his Stamina is below 0, Ajax is [[/apply bleeding]], he can choose any two options from his Tactical Stance trait each round, and the Director gains 2 additional Malice per round.

tier3.display: {{potency}} prone and the target loses 1d3 Recoveries

effect.after:
Ajax shifts up to 2 squares between striking each target.

[[/roll 1d3]]{1d3 recovery loss}

spend.text: Ajax can strike one additional target for each Malice spent.

target.custom: Each enemy and object in the area

effect.after:
A hexed target glows green, and each of their heroic abilities has its cost increased by 2.

[[/apply prone]]{Malice Prone}

spend.text: The potency increases by 1. Additionally, the ground beneath the area drops 3 squares and is difficult terrain. Each flying target who has M < 5 is knocked prone.

effects.name: Hexed
effects.description: A hexed target glows green, and each of their heroic abilities has its cost increased by 2.

items.name: Is This What They Taught You?

effect.before: The target is marked while Ajax is marked. While the target is marked this way, Ajax gains an edge on power rolls against them, and whenever the target uses a triggered action involving their mark on Ajax, he can make a free strike against them.

system.trigger: A creature within distance marks Ajax.

effect.before: Ajax makes a free strike against the target, dealing extra damage equal to twice the amount that was reduced. This extra damage can’t be reduced in any way.

system.trigger: An enemy within distance uses an ability to reduce damage.

effect.before: Ajax shifts up to his speed and can make a free strike. If the target has [[potency R 4]], this free strike also makes them [[/apply weakened turn]]{weakened} until the end of their next turn.

system.trigger: A creature uses the Hesitation is Weakness ability.

items.name: Your Obsession With Me Betrays You

effect.before: If the target has [[potency I 4]], they use a signature ability against a target of Ajax's choice.

system.trigger: Ajax causes a creature within distance to gain ferocity or wrath.

effect.before: Ajax regains the same amount of Stamina.

system.trigger: A creature within 10 squares regains Stamina.

effect.after: Ajax flies at high speed to cut through each target, then appears in an unoccupied space within distance.

effect.before:
Ajax uses the shadow elf eclipse’s technique to reduce each target’s surges to 0. Additionally, until the end of the round, Ajax ignores edges and double edges on any target’s abilities, and ignores any nondamaging effects of any target’s damage-dealing abilities.

Special: This villain action can be replaced with a villain action from a creature any target has previously encountered.

Each target who has [[potency I 5]] is knocked [[/apply prone]] and [[/apply 8PBTSqtB8xUXvdtu]] until Ajax deals damage to them. For each target not knocked prone, Ajax can move up to his speed toward that target and use Blade of the Gol King against them.

Ajax attempts to instill doubt into a creature within line of effect through logic and reason. The creature and Ajax make an opposed Reason test. If Ajax wins, he chooses to either deal [[/damage 11 extra]] damage action during the current round. Ajax can’t use this feature against the same creature during the same encounter.

Until the end of the round, Ajax chooses one of the following environments on top of the encounter map, temporarily merging multiple realities.

Incredibly High Above the Ground: The winds whip and bluster. Any creature who can’t fly takes a −3 penalty to stability, and forced movement effects gain a +3 bonus to their distance against such creatures. [[/apply RqFsTSh2IaSnituD]]

Swamp: The ground is difficult terrain for enemies. Any creature who starts and ends their turn in the same space is [[/apply restrained save]]

Volcanic Canyon: The air is stiflingly hot. Each enemy takes [[/damage 5 fire]]{5 fire damage} for each square they enter.

effects.name: Incredibly High Above the Ground
effects.description: Any creature who can't fly takes a -3 penalty to stability, and forced movement effects gain a +3 bonus to their distance against such creatures.

effect.before: Ajax takes an additional main action on his turn. He can use this feature even if he is dazed.

target.custom: Each enemy and object in the area

effect.before:
NOTE: area is Four 3 cubes within 10

Each target makes a test using their highest characteristic.

!

[[/damage 26]]{26 damage}; [[/apply qjXeWgkCqr0K87AF save]]

@

[[/damage 22]]{22 damage}; [[/apply bleeding save]]

#

[[/damage 16]]{16 damage}

Ajax then raises his Blade of the Gol King above his head as four giant blades emerge from the ground to fill the area. Each target is pushed into an unoccupied space adjacent to the area after the power roll is resolved. Each blade blocks line of effect and can be dismissed by Ajax at will (no action required).

description.value:
At the start of each round, Ajax chooses a new stance from one of the following options and gains its benefits:

Insurgent

Ajax automatically treats his initial power roll as a 17. He can still roll to determine if he scores a critical hit.

Mastermind

Before he uses an ability, Ajax can either shift up to 2 squares, or can cause one creature within line of effect to slide up to 2 squares, ignoring stability.

Vanguard

Ajax has damage immunity 5. Additionally, any enemy who makes a power roll that includes Ajax as a target has a double bane on the roll.

effect.before: Two allies within 10 squares of Ajax each move up to their speed and can use a signature ability.

description.value: This is an altered Statblock for Ajax the Invincible if he is being used with other monsters in the battle.
